question: With which one of the following movements, Aruna Asaf Ali was connected as a woman organizer of underground activity?
explanation: The members of the Socialist Party including Ram Manohar Lohia, Jayaprakash Narayan, and Aruna Asaf Ali started consolidating underground networks during the Quit India Movement. The role of the underground movement was seen as one keeping up popular morale by providing a line of command and guidance to activists across the country.
